RESOURCE.NAME: ConnectSesameOntology
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Connect to a repository containing and ontology

PARAMETER.NAME: repositoryLocation
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The location of the repository, either a direcotry or a Sesame server URL

PARAMETER.NAME: repositoryID
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the repository to connect to

RESOURCE.NAME: CreateSesameOntology
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Create a ontology from a Sesame configuration file for a repository

PARAMETER.NAME: repositoryLocation
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The location of the repository, either a direcotry or a Sesame server URL

PARAMETER.NAME: repositoryID
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the repository to create

PARAMETER.NAME: configFile
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the configuration file to use

RESOURCE.NAME: OWLIM Ontology
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Ontology created as a temporary OWLIM3 in-memory repository

PARAMETER.NAME: baseURI
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Ontology base URI, default is http://gate.ac.uk/dummybaseuri#

PARAMETER.NAME: mappingsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of a file containing mappings between ontology import URIs and URLs or blank

PARAMETER.NAME: loadImports
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If the ontology imports specified in the ontology should get automatically loaded

PARAMETER.NAME: dataDirectoryURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Directory that should contain the repository director

RESOURCE.NAME: OWLIM Ontology DEPRECATED
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Ontology created as a temporary OWLIM3 in-memory repository, for backwards compatibility only

PARAMETER.NAME: mappingsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of a file containing mappings between ontology import URIs and URLs or blank

PARAMETER.NAME: loadImports
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If the ontology imports specified in the ontology should get automatically loaded

PARAMETER.NAME: dataDirectoryURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Directory that should contain the repository director

PARAMETER.NAME: baseURI
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Ontology base URI, default is http://gate.ac.uk/dummybaseuri#
